data.actual_result: The long name continues on, and eventually gets cut off.
data.expected_result: The long name should be cut off with ...
data.short_description: Group name gets cut off in chat when it is extremely long in characters. [ 1366 x 768 Screen Resolution. May have to resize. ]
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a new group chat, or use an existing group. - Rename it to something that's really long. (the example I had was 96 characters long).  - Observe the chat.
